Articles.Content:
'tis. It's always a draw

This battle taught me my missiles are UBER awesome, and I no longer must fear the bayonet as much as before. but that Javelin- thingy was scary effective, you obliterated my first ship

So Zeke fears bayonets, I fear Dreks but not bayonets.

What does Spartwo fear?

So Zeke fears bayonets, I fear Dreks but not bayonets.

What does Spartwo fear?

not anymore, I can kill obliterate one in one hit... before it took 4 missiles to disable. my have weapons changed...

So Zeke fears bayonets, I fear Dreks but not bayonets.

What does Spartwo fear?

If I'm backed in a corner it'd be a H-Drek.Under any other situation I can out range and out maneuver almost any ship.That's why I put myself in a relatively cramped area,I wanted to see if I could outright win(and if zekes' next attack were to fail I would have) and they aren't something I would worry about too much.

not anymore, I can kill obliterate one in one hit... before it took 4 missiles to disable. my have weapons changed...

No,the attachment points have become bugged from uploading and downloading repeatedly.

Senior port-AFM

Main torpedos-Side mounted fuel tank

I could find a few more but I haven't had to tear it open in months.

It might also be that you're accustomed to the smooth curves of that hull.

That does make me wonder who fears my ships

My fears are (from people I have battled)

Spartwo: Bayonet (only ship I have faced, not really afraid of it)

Zeke: Drek XIV- (AE the massacre at Eve)

Daemon- Any ship that starts off on ground (resource issues)

Camulus777- it was a frigate (can't remember name)

PlonioFludrasco- his fighter (only ship I faced, not really afraid)

ScriptKitt3h- His battlecruser (its like a fatter version of the Drek XIV)

(im actually not so sure why everyone is still afraid of the Drek, it's outdated, slow, and impossibly small range)

ScriptKitt3h- His battlecruser (its like a fatter version of the Drek XIV)

...THIS THING! Oh god it is surprisingly well armored... but my new shredder missiles do it off quickly.
Because it's a missile tube with engines(no fuel)

(im actually not so sure why everyone is still afraid of the Drek, it's outdated, slow, and impossibly small range)

I have only faced you once so thats all I know. I also didn't use range like I should have.
Actually I've never fought the Dreks that aren't just tubes.

Actually I've never fought the Dreks that aren't just tubes.

Although technically the Drek 15 model would not really be a tube. More like a box

(im actually not so sure why everyone is still afraid of the Drek, it's outdated, slow, and impossibly small range)

...THIS THING! Oh god it is surprisingly well armored... but my new shredder missiles do it off quickly.

I take pride in my work... Also, I might try making a type of 1.25 meter round like your shredders. It would be great for my replacement for my old frigates I've been brainstorming, and for upgrading the Hawking-class.

(P.S.: my battlecruiser is tough because only the crew/drive section uses heavy armor. The front half only houses the ammo, which is inherently expendable. )

Well Ive stated my fears of other players I've faced

What are y'alls?

Well Ive stated my fears of other players I've faced

What are y'alls?

anything that can bounce my Shredders or outrange me. That's about it. Fortunately no ship has seriously done this in practice...

Well Ive stated my fears of other players I've faced

What are y'alls?

In the words of TF2's Heavy:

"I fear no man. But... that thing(drek 15-4)... it scares me."

Honestly, I'm not that afraid of other ships. I know from careful research that every vessel has its weaknesses. Such as the Trinity's weakness to 20 I-beams. Really, if something scares you, just kill it with fire.

in the words of tf2's heavy:

"i fear no man. But... That thing(drek 15-4)... It scares me."

honestly, i'm not that afraid of other ships. I know from careful research that every vessel has its weaknesses. Such as the trinity's weakness to 20 i-beams. really, if something scares you, just kill it with fire.
